adrFormatAddress: Luke's Theatre, Ground floor, 308 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036-3801, USA

originalText.text: Took my daughter to see “This Ones For the Girls ,” Mother’s Day weekend, what a joyous time and excellent performance by the cast.  My daughter was amazed at the struggle women went through over the last 100 years. We were definitely delighted and had an awesome time. I really didn’t pay much attention to the interior or exterior of the theater because I was very pleased with what I went to see a fantastic show.

originalText.text:
I went there with my son's kindergarten class.  They went to see A Snowy Day and Other Stories by Ezra Keats.  The other stories included Whistle for Willie, Goggles!, and A Letter to Amy. The class loved the show.  They had already read the books.

The cast was very upbeat and portrayed the stories very well.  The cast allowed the class to take a photo with them on stage.

The staff at the theatre was very friendly and help ful.

text.text:

originalText.text:
Little run-down theater filled with passion and joy.

The Actors have great voices and especially the monster came with so much passion in the voice. Great job!
Also the lady on the piano has done a terrific job.

The theater needs a little paint job and somebody to improve and fix the requisites.
For example it would be fantastic to see some cables which leads to the monster's neck. The connector pins at the neck are a important feature of frankenstein's monster.
I miss the classic robe at least in that part where the monster meet Victor for the first time.

We were a little sceptical because of being the first time in a off Broadway musical but we had a really nice time. Thanks!

originalText.text:
The writing? Clever. The lyrics? Cleverer. Elizabeth's vibrato? About as wide as my pinkie. Hotel? Trivago.

We came on a class field trip, for a good time senior year. We had a time, for sure. Unforgettable.

If you were the type not to read assignments in English in high school, rejoice! Because this is not a faithful adaption.

Incomparable to anything I've seen before.

originalText.text: Theater needs updates, curtain very shabby and not a good first impression, but For The Girls was very entertaining and the four females knocked it out of the park! The theater needs a good a.c. system so you can enjoy the shaow.
